([0b96755](http://stash.cfops.it:7999/www/cf-ux/commits/0b96755))

([9684155](http://stash.cfops.it:7999/www/cf-ux/commits/9684155))

references ([fe1d8b5](http://stash.cfops.it:7999/www/cf-ux/commits/fe1d8b5))

([d6958f7](http://stash.cfops.it:7999/www/cf-ux/commits/d6958f7))

([dea0f4c](http://stash.cfops.it:7999/www/cf-ux/commits/dea0f4c))

([6743d53](http://stash.cfops.it:7999/www/cf-ux/commits/6743d53))

([3f76f3b](http://stash.cfops.it:7999/www/cf-ux/commits/3f76f3b))

([99cc542](http://stash.cfops.it:7999/www/cf-ux/commits/99cc542))

* **all:** update snapshots

# [3.0.0](https://github.com/cloudflare/cf-ui/compare/cf-component-icon@2.4.1...cf-component-icon@3.0.0) (2017-09-15)

### Chores

* **cf-component-icon:** need this to get a breaking change (#374)
([3686a7a](https://github.com/cloudflare/cf-ui/commit/3686a7a))

### BREAKING CHANGES

* **cf-component-icon:** Icon now uses fela
